articles.author: Michael Rios, Nimi Princewill
articles.title: Russian weapons and trainers arrive in Niger weeks after US military agreement ends - CNN
articles.description: Russia has delivered military equipment to Niger that will provide the African country with the “latest generation of anti-aircraft defense systems,” Nigerien state broadcaster RTN said Thursday.
articles.content:
Russia has delivered military equipment to Niger that will provide the African country with the latest generation of anti-aircraft defense systems, Nigerien state broadcaster RTN said Thursday.
